Review_Text: The food was cold and the delivery took 2 hours. Very disappointed.
Amazing experience! The staff was very polite and the ambiance was great.
The app kept crashing when I tried to pay. Fix this immediately!
I love the product but the packaging was torn when it arrived today.
Average service, nothing special. Might not come back.
Wait time was too long even with a reservation. Unacceptable.
The interface is clean but I found a bug in the settings menu.
Best experience ever. Highly recommend to everyone!
I was promised a refund last week and I am still waiting. Unprofessional.
The quality of the fabric has gone down. Not worth the premium price.
The security on the login page is weak. As a long-time user, I'm worried.
Delivery was fast, but the item I received was the wrong color.
Your API documentation is outdated. Spent 3 hours debugging for nothing.
Simple and effective. Does exactly what it says on the box.
Great customer support! They solved my issue in under 5 minutes.
The shipping cost is more than the product itself. Ridiculous.
Delivery was so fast I thought it was a mistake! Great job.
The subscription renewal happened without a reminder email. Please refund.
The product smells like chemicals. I am allergic and very upset.
Excellent integration with other tools. Saves me so much time.
The waterproof coating failed after one use. Not as advertised.
The tracking link never updated. I had to call three times to find my package.
Incredible brightness and battery life. Perfect for my night shifts.
The size guide is completely wrong. The shirt I got is way too big.
Great value for the price, but the instructions were a bit confusing.
Sophisticated design and high-quality materials. Very impressed.
The billing department made a duplicate charge. Please rectify this.
The durability is unmatched. Survived a high-impact drop without a scratch.
Exquisite craftsmanship. A true representation of luxury.
The metal finish is already peeling. I expected better durability for the cost.
